column4: Guys, I'm in "grub rescue>" mode right now, I think my linux partition is messed, can I still load one of my windows partitions?
Could anyone help me out? I'm trying to see if I can load a Windows partition of mine from Grub's rescue mode....
So no one can help me, yes?
I'm stuck in Grub's rescue mode
when I hit ls, all I can see is msdos partitions, no linux partitions
so I'm wondering if I can somehow still load into one of the msdos partitions?
but you don't have any linux partition ....
yeah, which is the *really* messed up thing
so, you wanna load your windows back?
unless you have grub installed in the ntfs ~ or you will have to bootCD to fix it ~ either supergrub , liveCD, or to revert back to M$ default with windows CD
it depends what did you did.
Sigh, I'm goign to give it a try.
I don't think Ubuntu is for me.
it isn't like that ~ it is just it is your first time , i think ~
